issue.title: Backend download of order files fails for localstorage
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

in class @Easysdi_shopTablediffusion@ : @JFactory::getApplication()->getParams@ is used.
This method exists in @SiteApplication@ class but not in @AdministratorApplication@ class (@JFactory@ returns dynamically the corresponding class).

We have to use @JComponentHelper::getParams@ instead.

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0
